table_description: Represents an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) Conditional Access Policy.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Specifies the identifier of a conditionalAccessPolicy object.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: Specifies a display name for the conditionalAccessPolicy object.

columns.name: state
columns.description: Specifies the state of the conditionalAccessPolicy object. Possible values are: enabled, disabled, enabledForReportingButNotEnforced.

columns.name: created_date_time
columns.description: The create date of the conditional access policy.

columns.name: modified_date_time
columns.description: The modification date of the conditional access policy.

columns.name: operator
columns.description: Defines the relationship of the grant controls. Possible values: AND, OR.

columns.name: applications
columns.description: Applications and user actions included in and excluded from the policy.

columns.name: application_enforced_restrictions
columns.description: Session control to enforce application restrictions. Only Exchange Online and Sharepoint Online support this session control.

columns.name: built_in_controls
columns.description: List of values of built-in controls required by the policy. Possible values: block, mfa, compliantDevice, domainJoinedDevice, approvedApplication, compliantApplication, passwordChange, unknownFutureValue.

columns.name: client_app_types
columns.description: Client application types included in the policy. Possible values are: all, browser, mobileAppsAndDesktopClients, exchangeActiveSync, easSupported, other.

columns.name: custom_authentication_factors
columns.description: List of custom controls IDs required by the policy.

columns.name: cloud_app_security
columns.description: Session control to apply cloud app security.

columns.name: locations
columns.description: Locations included in and excluded from the policy.

columns.name: persistent_browser
columns.description: Session control to define whether to persist cookies or not. All apps should be selected for this session control to work correctly.

columns.name: platforms
columns.description: Platforms included in and excluded from the policy.

columns.name: sign_in_frequency
columns.description: Session control to enforce signin frequency.

columns.name: sign_in_risk_levels
columns.description: Sign-in risk levels included in the policy. Possible values are: low, medium, high, hidden, none, unknownFutureValue.

columns.name: terms_of_use
columns.description: List of terms of use IDs required by the policy.

columns.name: users
columns.description: Users, groups, and roles included in and excluded from the policy.

columns.name: user_risk_levels
columns.description: User risk levels included in the policy. Possible values are: low, medium, high, hidden, none, unknownFutureValue.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tenant_id
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTenant
